title: Input
description: A single audio input for the sound system.

id.description: A unique identifier for the input.

band_id.description: The ID of the band this input belongs to.

name.description: The input's name (e.g., 'Kick In', 'Stereo Keys L').

short_name.description: A short name for the input (e.g., 'Kik').

channel_id.description: The ID of the console channel this input is patched to.

linked_to.description: The ID of another input this input is linked with (e.g., for a stereo pair).
